text: @BillyGraham @realDonaldTrump Be very afraid. You will be judged by Biblical standards, not your warped morals. #DonTheCon #coronavirus #TrumpLiesAmericansDie #GOPCorruption #WearAMask You need to self quarantine for 14 days, remember? I'll never vote Republican again. Y'all are greedy, selfish a-holes.#Trump
